QuestData.Title: Breaking Waves of Change
QuestData.Description: It seems you have your first charge. You must travel back down to Rut'theran Village, where we first arrived, and speak to Vesprystus to secure a ride to Lor'danel.$B$BOnce in Lor'danel, aid the night elves in any way that you are able. I am trusting you to treat them with the reverence that they deserve in light of all that they have done for us.$B$BI must travel to the distant city of Stormwind to meet with King Anduin. I hope to see your face again very soon, $n. Until then, a fond farewell.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Vesprystus in Rut'theran Village to secure a ride to Lor'danel.
QuestData.RewardText: Our allies have come to our aid? Thank Elune. Tyrande was wise to extend open arms to your people.$B$BWe need help. We need everyone we can get.
